comment._content: If you have any information regarding the individuals within the picture, please leave  a comment.

comment.author: 7711591@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Jewish People and History - Ancient and Modern, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 38968692@N00
comment._content:
Mrs. Epsteins first name was 'Cilly'. It is Sidonie (not Sidorie) Dann.

Bertha Holzmann and Clementine Cramer were also members of the Weibliche Fürsorge at the beginning, so I suspect they also are in this picture.

My source:

Klausmann, Christina: Politik und Kultur im Kaiserreich: Das Beispiel Frankfurt. Frankfurt, New York: campus verlag 1997  (p.160).
